title: [$$] Once Market Darlings, Tech Stocks Enter ‘Prove-It-To-Me’ Era
text: Reblog Investors rattled by recent volatility are becoming choosier about which technology-focused stocks they scoop up, a reversal from 2017 that threatens to undermine the tech sector’s dominance in the long stock rally. The S&P 500 tech sector, up 1.8% in 2018, is still among the best-performing groups in the broader index. With valuations already stretched by traditional measures, investors are contemplating which companies warrant the higher multiples that typically come with the tech label.
